flawed_nl_solution:
The classes in the pack cost $7.5 each because 75 / 10 = <<75/10=7.5>>7.5
An additional class costs $10 because 7.5 x (1 +(1/3)) = <<7.5*(1+(1/3))=10>>10
She buys 7 extra classes because 13 - 10 = <<13-10=7>>7
Her three additional classes cost $70 because 7 x 10 = <<7*10=70>>70
Her total cost is $145 because 75 + 70 = <<75+70=145>>145

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
